Big Data Storage: Open Table Formats (Apache Hive, Iceberg, Delta Lake)
Data Architecture (Data Lakes, Data Warehouses, Lakehouse)
Data Pipelines: ETL tools (Airbyte, DBT, Glue ETL, Pyspark)
API data extraction (REST, GraphQL, pagination, rate limiting)
Data Reliability & Governance: Retry mechanisms, backfill strategies, structured logging
Data lineage and metadata management (OpenLineage, Marquez, dbt docs)

Python Core: Data Structures: list, dict, set, tuple
Typing & Packaging: type hints, pyproject.toml, uv, poetry
API Development: Frameworks: FastAPI, Flask, Chalice, Django REST Framework
Design Principles: REST, OpenAPI, versioning, idempotency
Testing & Documentation: pytest, httpx, Swagger, ReDoc

Machine Learning Workflow: Model versioning & experiment tracking (MLflow, Weights & Biases)
MLOps & Deployment: CI/CD for ML (GitHub Actions, Docker, Terraform, Kubernetes)
Monitoring & retraining strategies (drift detection, feedback loops)
AI for Data Engineering: LLMs for structured/unstructured data enrichment (OpenAI, Hugging Face)
Automated labeling, classification & anomaly detection pipelines
